release.action: Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub), das-adapter and junit.
Fixed delay in retrieval of citations from PDBe: now there is only one request to the DAS server with the UniProt accession instead of many with PDBe identifiers.
Added configuration for CiteXplore client pool size.

release.description: Faster searches. Citations sorted by date.
release.action: Updated to last version of das-adapter.
Split callables for every PDB identifier, in order to thread the search.
Citations are now sorted by creation date by default.
Updated to last version of parent, biobabel-citations, uniprotjapi - set to use always the latest one - and log4j.
